Articles.Content: just made my first encounter with the min! wish me luck with landing ))

Touch-Down! i did have some issues with my landing legs that led to the entire ship flipping over and every thing but the cockpit exploded ??? but none the less, i now have a space capsule with three kerbalnauts ready to get out and explore the min when .16 hits!

Its like they say.. any landing you can walk away from is a good one..

But you can always send a rescue team later on, so long as they don\'t end up like this:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14861.0
True that, im just excited for when i can get out and walk around
Just got my first mun 'landing' {Crash capsule and a little junk survived tho }
Minmus is an awesome place to land, i love it.
